Chapter 1 Installing bdDwC 1.1 Stable version from CRAN # The easiest way to get bdDwC is to install the whole bdverse: install.packages("bdverse") # Alternatively, install just bdDwC: install.packages("bdDwC") 1.2 Development version from GitHub Windows users install Rtools first. install.packages("devtools") devtools::install_github("bd-R/bdDwC") 1.3 Possible problems and solutions 1.3.1 ???
